formattedAddress: 77 E 10th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 77 E 10th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Doris did an amazing job with my hair! Highly recommend! Not only she got the cut done exactly how I wanted it, but she also did an amazing job with my blonde highlights and color! You can tell she is experienced and very efficient! She did it all for record time while I usually spend hours at other salons to get the results! I needed a new hair dresser in the area and so happy I found her - I will definitely be going back there on a regular basis!

text.text: Doris did an amazing job with my hair! Highly recommend! Not only she got the cut done exactly how I wanted it, but she also did an amazing job with my blonde highlights and color! originalText.text:
DO NOT GET YOUR HAIR DONE HERE!
Words cannot describe how terrible my experience has been at this salon. I went in to get a color and cut-I am a brunette and I wanted to go lighter. Doris explained that she would have to strip the color from my hair then lighten. She did so and after she lightened it it was SO brassy. I had wanted a light brown color, something similar to my natural color but understand that we probably wouldn't be able to get that light in one session. Boy, if you could see the color I came out with!! Red-toned, brassy brown on the bottom and light light blonde on my roots.

I also paid extra for styling and the waves came out an hour later! My hair looked so fried and dead afterward. I came home and my boyfriend was shocked by how terrible my hair looked. Right then and there I should have asked for my money back but I'm never THAT person. Two weeks go by, all of my friends and family (and my stylist back home) tell me how terrible my hair looks and I finally decided to ask for my money back for the dye job. I asked Doris for at least part of the money back and she blatantly refused, saying that's how it's supposed to look (I attached photos of how I wanted it to look vs what I got.) She said she wanted to fix it with toner but there is no way I'm letting her touch my hair again.

originalText.text: Dori is incredible! She is quite literally an angel - so kind and flexible moving her schedule around to make it more convenient for you. I get blonde high lights and balayage and am very picky when it comes to salons. I wont be going anywhere else she makes me blonder and keeps it looking so natural. Shes the best !!

originalText.text: I 100% urge you - especially all of you blondes - GO SEE DORIS! I recently moved to the area + had walked past ISalon a few times. I then saw it on Groupon so quickly took advantage of the great offer. The holidays were approaching, + of course Doris was pretty busy. I was anxious to get an appt as I‚Äôm flying out for a wedding in 4 days. Doris went above + beyond to accommodate, landing an appt for me on New Year‚Äôs Eve. The salon was clean, super cute, the decor is gorgeous + the music was fab. And, I was met with New Year‚Äôs Celebration red wine! Yas please! The end result is a perfect blonde, it‚Äôs exactly what I wanted, + I‚Äôm so happy. Groupon or no Groupon, I‚Äôm so thrilled I found Doris (who happens to also be the most sweetest gal on the LES), + I‚Äôm now a committed ISalon chick. I found my place. Thanks Doris!! üíñ
